infotexts.entitydescription.geneextractor: A specialized fabricator designed for Extracting Genes.
infotexts.entitydescription.empty_syringe_bone: A empty syringe used for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.bone_marrow: A syringe full of Bone Marrow.
infotexts.entitydescription.stem_cells: A syringe full of Stem Cells.
infotexts.entitydescription.biological_material: A syringe full of Biological Material.
infotexts.entitydescription.bioprinter: A specialized fabricator designed for printing biological organs.
infotexts.entitydescription.stemcellprocessor: A specialized fabricator designed for synthesising Stem Cells.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bonemarrowextracte: The patient's bone marrow has been extracted.
infotexts.entitydescription.chemmaster: A machine that makes pills out of chemicals loaded inside.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.base: {id} is not a valid pill base.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.binder: {id} is not a valid pill binder.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.filler: {id} is not a valid pill filler.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.active: {id} is not a valid active ingredient for pills.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.invalidcategory.dye: {id} is not a valid pill dye.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.capacity: This configuration can only support up to {cap} active ingredients.
infotexts.lua.chemerror.yield: This configuration would not yield any pills.
infotexts.entitydescription.chemalyzer: Displays the composition of pills that are placed inside.
infotexts.entitydescription.custompill: Who knows what effects this pill could have?
infotexts.entitydescription.custompill_horsepill: Quite big for you to haphazardly shove into your mouth.
infotexts.entitydescription.custompill_tablets: It can't be that bad, right?
infotexts.entitydescription.pillbottleregular: A plastic prescription bottle for storing pills.
infotexts.entitydescription.pillbottleadvanced: A large plastic bottle used to store various pills. It's fitted with a child proof lid that is impossible to open without medical education. Perfect for keeping grabby hands out of harm's way.
infotexts.entitydescription.nightgoggles: Standard Night Vision Goggles. Requires Batteries.
infotexts.entitydescription.organscalpel_eyes: A specialized scalpel used in eye surgeries.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyespoon: A specialized medical gadget for careful extraction of donor eyes. Works on both humans and monsters.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyeglasses: An outdated device used in temporairly relieving vision problems.
infotexts.entitydescription.aviatorglasses: An ancient accessory that is said to be only used by commanders of airships. Gives a lot of confidence.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyejar: A jar that utilises stem cell regeneration to mend eyes slowly. Will not fully restore eyes.
infotexts.entitydescription.deusizinedrops: Prevents eye damage from internal and external causes.
infotexts.entitydescription.muscleconnectors: Connects the eye muscles, use after eye gel and before nerve connectors.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyegel: Moisturizes the eye holes, use before muscle connectors.
infotexts.entitydescription.medicallensitem: An upgrade that can be applied to bionic eyes to give the patient medical scanner vision. ‖color:120,200,120‖ Press F to on a limb to scan.‖color:end‖ ‖color:200,200,120‖ Press F to turn on/off.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.electricallensitem: An upgrade that can be applied to bionic eyes to give the patient electrical scanner vision. ‖color:200,200,120‖ Press F to turn on/off.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.zoomlensitem: An upgrade that can be applied to bionic eyes to give the patient visual magnification ability. ‖color:100,100,200‖ Press - or + to magnify.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.eyelens: Used in cataract surgeries, put in after emulsification.
infotexts.entitydescription.nerveconnectors: Connects the eye nerves, use after muscle connectors and before putting the eyes in.
infotexts.entitydescription.eye_laser_tool: A compact surgery tool for treating imperfections of the cornea. Requires high amounts of skill to operate.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes: Right out of a human's skull. Used for transplants.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_monste: Right out of a monster's skull. Not great for seeing things, but stylish at parties.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_terror: An eye-like object that is unbeknownst to humanity. Proceed with caution.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_husk: Right out of a husk's skull. Cannot be damaged by water, and has a chance to give the patient husk infection.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_bionic: A metal, much more resilient eye, made for transplantation. Can't be damaged by bodily afflictions and needs to repaired manually. Slightly increases vision quality. Can be upgraded using special lenses.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_night: A pair of eyes, that comes with night vision implants. Can't be turned off on demand.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_infrar: A pair of eyes with infrared implants. Slightly improves combat skill and vision in dark.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_plasti: A pair of "eyes", not much better than being blind. While its hard to see clear with them, at least they look fashionable.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.noeye: The patient's eyes have been surgically removed, with empty, red holes taking their place. Horrific.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyedamage: The patient's eyes look flat, and they have trouble seeing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeshock: The patient's immune system did not accept the eye, and is attacking it instead. Eye removal or immunosuppressants are required to stop it.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyedrop: The patient's eye healing rate has increased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.deusizinedrop: The patient's eyes are saturated with Deusizine, preventing most damage to the eye including pressure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeone: The patient has lost all vision in one of the eyes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyesdead: The patient has lost all vision and their eyes are unresponsive.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyesickness: The patient has trouble seeing, likely because of a recent eye transplant. Should wear off in time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyecataract: The patient's eyes look cloudy, and their vision is blurred. Surgery advised.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyemuscle: Muscle connectors are attached to the eye holes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyegell: Eye gel is applied to the eye holes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyepopped: The eyeballs have popped outside the skull and are hanging.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.corneaincision: An incision into the cornea has been made.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.emulsification: The eye lens has been removed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.lasereyesurgery: Patient's eyes are rapidly healing due to recent laser surgery.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyenight: The patient has night vision eyes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeterror: You feel a comforting sense of bloodlust and strength. You are more resilient. You are alive. You must kill. KAR EN TUK
infotexts.loadingscreentip: Latchers and Charybdis' see the world different.
Husk Eyes have can give the patient husk infection.
Laser Surgery Tool consumes high amounts of power.
Eye Regeneration Jar can regenerate a dead eye.
Cataract causes blurry vision, use glasses.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureominus: Combine with any blood plasma to fabricate an O- blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureoplus: Combine with any blood plasma to fabricate an O+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureabminus: Combine with AB blood plasma to fabricate an AB- blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureabplus: Combine with AB blood plasma to fabricate an AB+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureaminus: Combine with AB or A blood plasma to fabricate an A- blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodcultureaplus: Combine with AB or A blood plasma to fabricate an A+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodculturebminus: Combine with AB or B plasma to fabricate an B- blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodculturebplus: Combine with AB or B plasma to fabricate an B+ blood pack
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmao: Compatible with O- and O+ blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmaab: Compatible with all blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmaa: Compatible with A-, A+, O-, and O+ blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodplasmab: Compatible with B-, B+, O-, and O+ blood and blood cell cultures\nPlasma infusions can be used to treat first and second degree burns, stabilize blood pH, and raise blood pressure similar to ringer's solution. \nIt can also temporarily prevent sepsis from increasing, as well as preventing neurotrauma stemming from liver failure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.revived: You have been brought back from death's door.
infotexts.entitydescription.revive_syringe: A powerful mix to prevent eternal rest. Effective only on the dead.
infotexts.entitydescription.nanobots: A syringe full of tiny medical robots. They can heal everyone including previously revived people.
infotexts.entitydescription.symbiosis_syringe: A syringe containing a refined symbiote, granting strength and awareness while binding host and parasite as one.
infotexts.entitydescription.xenocrystal: A alien crystal formed from various metals.
